14.verse: [B] . . . . (managis)tans broþre in fraujin gatrauandans bandjom meinaim mais gadaursan unagandans waurd gudis rodjan.

15.verse: [B] sumai raihtis jah in neiþis jah haif<s>tais, sumai þan in godis wiljins Xristu merjand,

16.verse: [B] sumai þan us friaþwai, witandans þatei du sunjonai aiwaggeljons gasatiþs im;

17.verse: [B] iþ þaiei us haifstai Xristu merjand, ni swiknaba, munandans sik aglons urraisjan bandjom meinaim.

18.verse: [B] hva auk? þandei allaim haidum, jaþþe inilon jaþþe sunjai, Xristus merjada; jah in þamma fagino, akei jah faginon duginna.

19.verse: [B] unte wait ei þata mis gagaggiþ du ganistai þairh izwara bida jah andstald ahmins Xristaus Iesuis,

20.verse: [B] bi usbeisnai jah wenai meinaim, unte ni in waihtai gaaiwiskoþs wairþa, ak in allai trauainai, swe sinteino jah nu, mikiljada Xristus in leika meinamma, jaþþe þairh libain jaþþe þairh dauþu.

21.verse: [B] aþþan mis liban Xristus ist jah gaswiltan gawaurki.

22.verse: [B] iþ jabai liban in leika, þata mis akran waurstwis ist, jah hvaþar waljau ni kann.

23.verse: [B] aþþan dishabaiþs <im> us þaim twaim: þanuh lustu habands andletnan jah miþ Xristau wisan, und filu mais batizo ist;

24.verse: [B] aþþan du wisan in leika þaurftozo in izwara.

25.verse: [B] jah þata triggwaba wait þatei wisa jah þairhwisa at allaim izwis du izwarai framgahtai jah fahedai galaubeinais izwaraizos,

26.verse: [B] ei hvoftuli izwara biauknai in Xristau Iesu in mis þairh meinana qum aftra du izwis.

27.verse: [B] hveh [þatainei] wairþaba aiwaggeljons Xristaus usmitaiþ, ei jaþþe qimau jah gasaihvau izwis, jaþþe aljaþro gahausjau bi izwis, þatei standiþ in ainamma ahmin, ainai saiwalai samana arbaidjandans galaubeinai aiwaggeljons,

28.verse: [B] jah ni in waihtai afagidai fram þaim andastaþjam, þatei ist im ustaikneins fralustais, iþ izwis ganistais, jah þata fram guda.

29.verse: [B] izwis fragiban ist faur Xristu ni þatainei du imma galaubjan, ak jah þata faur ina winnan,

30.verse: [B] þo samon haifst habandans, þoei gasaihviþ in mis jah nu hauseiþ in mis.

1.verse: [B] Jabai hvo nu gaþrafsteino in Xristau, jabai hvo gaþlaihte friaþwos, jabai hvo gamainduþe ahmins, jabai hvo mildiþo jah gableiþeino,

2.verse: [B] usfulleiþ meina fahed, ei þata samo hugjaiþ, þo samon friaþwa habandans, samasaiwalai, samafraþjai;

3.verse: [B] ni waiht bi haifstai aiþþau lausai hauheinai, ak in allai hauneinai gahugdais anþar anþarana munands sis auhuman;

4.verse: [B] ni þo seina hvarjizuh mitondans, ak jah þo anþaraize hvarjizuh.

5.verse: [B] þata auk fra[i]þjaidau in izwis, þatei jah in Xristau Iesu,

6.verse: [B] saei in gudaskaunein wisands ni wulwa rahnida wisan sik galeiko guda,

7.verse: [B] ak sik silban uslausida, wlit skalkis nimands, in galeikja manne waurþans,

8.verse: [B] jah manaulja bigitans swe manna. gahaunida sik silban, waurþans ufhausjands attin und . . . .

22.verse: [B] . . . . þatei swe attin barn miþskalkinoda mis in aiwaggeljon.

23.verse: [B] þanuh nu wenja sandjan, biþe gasaihva hva bi mik ist, suns.

24.verse: [B] aþþan gatraua in fraujin, þammei jah silba sprauto qima.

25.verse: [B] aþþan þarb munda, Aipafraudeitu broþar jah gawaurstwan jah gahlaiban meinana, iþ izw<ar>ana apaustulu jah andbaht þaurftais meinaizos sandjan du izwis;

26.verse: [B] unte gairnjands was allaize izwara jah unwunands, in þizei hausideduþ ina siukan.

27.verse: [B] jah auk siuks was nehva dauþau, akei guþ ina gaarmaida; aþþan ni þatainei ina, ak jah mik, ei gaurein ana gaurein ni habau.

28.verse: [B] sniumundos nu insandida ina, ei gasaihvandans ina aftra fag(ino)þ jah ik hlasoza sijau [uf(kun)nands hva bi izwis ist].

29.verse: [B] andnimaiþ nu ina in fraujin miþ allai fahedai jah þans swaleikans swerans ha[i]baiþ,

30.verse: [B] unte in waurstwis Xristaus und dauþu atnehvida, ufarmunnonds saiwalai seinai, ei usfullidedi izwar gaidw bi mein andbahti.

1.verse: [B] Þata anþar, broþrjus meinai, faginoþ in fraujin; þo samona izwis meljan mis sweþauh ni latei, iþ izwis þwastiþa.

2.verse: [B] saihviþ þans hundans, saihviþ þans ubilans waurstwjans, saihviþ þo gamaitanon.

3.verse: [B] aþþan weis sijum bimait, weis ahmin guda skalkinondans jah hvopandans in Xristau Iesu, jah ni in leika gatrauam,

4.verse: [B] jah þan ik habands trauain jah in leika. jabai (hvas) anþar þugkeiþ trauan in l(eika), ik mais:

5.verse: [B] bimait ahtaudogs, us knodai Israelis, kunjis Baineiameinis, Haibraius us Haibraium, bi witoda Fareisaius,

6.verse: [B] bi aljana wrakjands aikklesjon, bi garaihtein þizai sei in witoda ist, wisands usfairina.

7.verse: [B] akei þatei was mis gawaurki, þatuh rahnida in Xristaus sleiþa wisan.

8.verse: [B] aþþan sweþauh all domja sleiþa wisan in ufarassaus kunþjis Iesuis Xristaus fraujins meinis, in þizei allamma gasleiþiþs im jah domja smarnos wisan allata, ei Xristau du gawaurkja habau,

9.verse: [B] jah bigitaidau in imma ni habands meina garaihtein, þo us witoda, ak þairh galaubein Iesuis Xristaus, sei us guda ist garaihtei ana galaubeinai,

10.verse: [B] du kunnan ina jah maht usstassais is jah gamainduþ þulaine is, miþkauriþs was dauþau is,

11.verse: [B] ei hvaiwa gaqimau in usstassai us dauþaim.

12.verse: [B] ni þatei ju andnemjau aiþþau ju garaihts gadomiþs sijau, aþþan ik afargagga, ei gafahau in þammei gafahans warþ fram Xristau.

13.verse: [B] broþrjus, ik mik silban ni nauh man gafahan;

14.verse: [B] aþþan ain sweþauh þaim afta ufarmunnonds, iþ du þaim þoei faura sind, mik ufþanjands, bi mundrein afargagga afar sigislauna þizos iupa laþonais gudis in Xristau Iesu.

15.verse: [B] swa managai nu swe sijaima fullawitans, þata hugjaima; jah jabai aljaleikos hugjiþ, jah þata izwis guþ andhuljiþ.

16.verse: [B] aþþan sweþauh du þammei gasnewum, ei samo hugjaima [jah samo fraþjaima].

17.verse: [B] miþgaleikondans meinai wairþaiþ, broþrjus, jah mundoþ izwis þans swa gaggandans, swaswe habaiþ frisaht unsis.

18.verse: [B] unte managai gaggand þanzei ufta qaþ izwis, iþ nu jah gretands qiþa þans fijands galgins Xristaus,

19.verse: [B] þizeei andeis wairþiþ fralusts, þize guþ wamba ist jah wulþus in skandai ize, þaiei airþeinaim fraþjand.

20.verse: [B] iþ unsara bauains in himinam ist, þaþroei jah nasjand usbeidam fraujan Iesu Xristu,

21.verse: [B] saei inmaideiþ leika hauneinais unsaraizos du ibnaskaunjamma leika wulþaus seinis bi waurstwa, unte mag jah ufhnaiwjan sis alla.

1.verse: [B] Swaei nu, broþrjus meinai liubans jah lustusamans, faheþs jah waips meins, swa standaiþ in fraujin.

2.verse: [B] Aiodian bidja jah Swntwkein bidja þata samo fraþjan in fraujin.

3.verse: [B] jai jah þuk waliso bidja gajuko, niþais þos þozei miþarbaididedun mis in aiwaggeljon miþ Klemaintau jah anþaraim gawaurstwam meinaim, þizeei namna sind in bokom libainais.

4.verse: [B] nunu nu faginoþ in fraujin sinteino; aftra qiþa, faginoþ!

5.verse: [B] anawilje izwara kunþa siai allaim mannam; frauja nehva ist.

6.verse: [B] ni waihtai maurnaiþ, ak in allai bidai jah aihtronai miþ awiliudam bidos izwaros kunþos sijaina at guda.

7.verse: [B] jah gawairþi gudis, þatei ufar ist all ahane, fastaiþ hairtona jah leika izwara in Xristau Iesu.

8.verse: [B] þata anþar, broþrjus, þishvah þatei ist sunjein, þishvah þatei gariud, þishvah þatei garaiht, þishvah þatei weih, þishvah þatei liubaleik, þishvah þatei wailameri, jabai hvo godeino, jabai hvo hazeino, þata mitoþ;

9.verse: [B] þatei jah galaisideduþ izwis jah ganemuþ jah gahausideduþ jah gasehvuþ in mis, þata taujaiþ, jah guþ gawairþeis sijai miþ izwis.

10.verse: [B] aþþan faginoda in fraujin mikilaba, unte ju hvan gaþaihuþ du faur mik fraþ(j)an, ana þammei jah froþuþ; aþþan analatidai waurþuþ.

11.verse: [B] ni þatei bi þarbai qiþau, unte ik galaisida mik in þaimei im ganohiþs wisan.

12.verse: [B] lais jah haunjan mik, lais jah ufarassu haban; in allamma jah in allaim usþroþiþs im, jah sads wairþan jah gredags, jah ufarassau haban jah þarbos þulan.

13.verse: [B] all mag in þamma inswinþjandin mik Xristau.

14.verse: [B] aþþan sweþauh waila gatawideduþ gamainja briggandans meina aglon.

15.verse: [B] aþþan wituþ jah jus, Filippisius, þatei in anastodeinai aiwaggeljons, þan usiddja af Makidonai, ni ain[n]ohun aikklesjono mis gamainida in raþjon gibos jah andanemis, alja jus ainai.

16.verse: [B] unte jah in Þaissalauneikai jah ainamma sinþa jah twaim andawizn mis insandideduþ.

17.verse: [B] ni þatei gasokjau giba, ak gasokja ak(ran) . . . .
